Text: she has her favorite students, if you are not one of her favorites then she won't pay attention to you
Too moody, doesn't care about the choir at all. If only she cared more, then we'd be a much better group. Often plays favortites, and doesn't teach much at all.
Wow, she plays favorites and is the most BORING teacher EVER. And she plays favorites. Oh, did I mention she plays favorites?
You should really stop playing favorites with the popular preps of BHS. Its not fair to the rest of your students. Your favoritism is so obvious. ZORRO

She's nice, but picks favorites! The only way you can have a good part in the play or get her to pick you for something is to be her favorite. It's so obvious and I understand when people subconsciously pick favorites but it's just so obvious!
Let's just say that she wasn't one of my favorites. It was obvious who her favorites were, and she just kind of put everyone else aside. She's very unclear.
He has his favorites. Everyone knows it. If you are his favorite you can get by with anything. There's definately a difference in the way he treats us students. He is UNFAIR!
she was the principal there and when i and a few of my friends were badly bullied we were completely ignored.
AWFUL! she is immature, she sucks with kids, and she is practically untalkable to. i love spanish, but my year with her made ne forget that.
She is a fave picker and doesnt let other students be dancers, or have main parts. we only get 2-3 lines.
i signed up for intermediate guitar, what do i get!? when she tuned my guitar, my guitar was more in tune with no strings and after my obece sister sat on it
i think your policies are totally out of line, i dont think your a good teacher, you are unfair you definatly choose favorites and it shows alot in the way you talk to people.
He is the worst teacher I ever had. His grading system is messed up and his favorite students are at an unfair advantage while giving everyone else a disadvantage.
Mr.Thomas, if you would pay attention and not ignor your students when they are tryin to help maybe the band would sound so bad and the choir would sing better.
Cook is ok as long as you can play well. Yea, he does favor his better players a lot more, so PRACTICE!
I didn't have her as a teacher, but from what I've heard is that she favors certain students and let's the popular crowd take over the yearbook. She likes things her way.
My experience with him was very different from most raters here. I found him to play favorites, joking around with some students while being short with others. It's hurtful and I will always rememebr
ms blauvelt made my life a living hell at porter. she definitely chooses favorites and if your not one of her favorites you are going down ?????
Totally played favorites with some students more than others. It got so bad that several people transferred out of the class.
Mrs. Paris is mean and isn't helpful. all she does is pick a side( part 1 or part 2) then complain about it.
I don't like Mr. Rink. He is to hard he favors students and he picked on me because I didn't practice the clarinet.
she does not talk to students. it is obvious that she likes some more than others and grades according to who she likes
Bad teacher. His pompous I'm-better-than-everyone-else attitude is unbearable. He's not even that talented at music, which shows while he's trying to teach.
Mean and uncaring. Is only nice to students she plays favorites with (jocks), all others she is unfair and cruel to.
worst teacher i ever had...biased...unfair...definitley plays favorites...verbally abuses students for no reason...she even verbally assaulted my mother over the telephone...WITCH
Another one of the faculty members that likes to gossip. Has her favorites...play softball and she will love you!
all he cares about is that we are good at the concert he does not care what we think or if we are having trouble with our instrument
She seems very picky and choosy... she doesn't like a lot of people and plays favorites. I don't enjoy her class even though I love playing my instrument...
agreeded but she can favorite some kids.......ask her a question once and only once though or erm yeah just dont
He makes fun of me almost everyday. he definitly pics favorites and basically every high school girl is on his favorites list hmmmm. and he is super lazy
Studying makes her tests easier, but she does practice favoritism. Sometimes some people will get better grades than others or will have more privileges just because they are in Math Elective.
Mr. Rondina is a good man and definitly knows a lot about music theory and piano, but his choral and vocal knowledge is questionable.
Not good. Not as smart as he thinks he is. You will do well if you attractive, female, and a cheerleader.
he def. has his favorites--its hard to predict who he will take a shine to--he is known for riciculing quiet and shy students--you're right--he IS pompous

He dosent listen to his students. All he cares about is stupid jazz music and his jazz band. Coming from Fuhrmann, Mott's band is just stupid. Its no wonder why a lot of students end up dropping band.
Unless your a favorite you don't do well and she judges speeches professionaly instead of on a high school level
Putnam can be tempermental and plays favorites...which I think is real lame. He makes people feel stupid and is allergic to bananas...
definently the worst teacher i have ever had, she plays favorites, and if she doesnt like you she will make it a very hard class to get a good grade in. i do not reccoment this teacher.

She is not a very good teacher and plays extreme favorites on certain people. When choosing people for the play/musical she closes the ones that can help her the most ranging from who can provide money for it to who can build things for the set. She never actually chooses on real talent as seen in her last musical, she choose someone since their mom could provide the the theater department with funding. Overall I think she is unfair and in general a bad teacher. Would not recommend!
She totally chose favorites and hated anyone who deny agree with her or who wasn't in cheer
there is only one way to do things and its HER way. Doesn't care that photography is about being original. Dislike her. She loves herself.
She plays favorites and can be very demanding, especially of string players. She also has frequent mood swings... She needs to realize music is not taken seriously by many students in her classes.
No offense to him, but he shouldn't be teaching theatre. His directing is insulting, his choice of plays is terrible, and he has less experience than most of his actors.
WORST TEACHER AT LANE. not fair that she favors the kids who ALREADY KNOW spanish. you will study your butt off and it will never show in your grade.
Mrs. Rimm plays favorites. She is VERY raceist. Not good if your a teacher. She compalins WAY TOO MUCH.
I quit band, never liked him when I was in band and i don't care for him now. Way too weird, strict, made me hate band and my instrument.
from a person who doesnt talk alot i noticed that mr. ross is extremely unfair to some students who act no differently then the rest of the class. he needs to be more fair
shes nice, but don't be fooled. she has a sneaky way of playing favorites and loves to get kids in a lot of trouble
umm very mean, harsh has favorites gives them 5 chances and the other kids 1 chance it is ridiculous.

She is passive aggressive, and a really bad grader. I got good grades in her class, but my friends who did equal quality work did so much worse than me. She made 3 people cry in my class. She clearly picks favorites.
Probably my least favorite teacher Sophomore year and definitely my least favorite history teacher ever.

Blair is the problem with our music program at LC. I had her for orchestra and she is the reason I stopped doing something I loved. Can't even compare her to Bart (sac teacher). I got worse, not better, throughout the year. Good at choir, bad at orchestra.

In my experience Valdez is a teacher who clearly plays favorites with her students and even with certain instruments. She does not develop musical theory skills and spends most of her time getting off topic and telling stories.
He's probably the worst teacher I have ever had, he completely ruined me on music, and my passion for orchestra. He's verbally abusive, and has a cold heart.
He is a horrible teacher and puts down his students. There is no way anyone could think is a good teacher. He should at least praise!
She can be moody but overall good. she often shows favoritism towards girls and A students her projects are fun and can go off track
who cares if he played for the unc basketball team if he was so good then why is he a teacher! he is so mean and is really weird with girls!
uum...idk wut to say about him...he give the worst singers parts in plays...and the actors absolutely stink
She only thinks about herself. She expects the students' lives to revolve around Choir. Even if you're dying, you can't skip Choir on the day before a performance.
i dislike her sooo much! she plays favorites and makes the non-favorites cry, and when they're crying, she yells at them more!she does'nt belong in a classroom!

Her peso system is frustrating. Basically you need 5 pesos for the vocal part of your test. The way to get these pesos is to participate. I'm fine with this idea but she executed this process in the worst way possible. She picks the same students over and over again and even if you do participate, you only have a 20% chance of getting a peso. I don't care about her singing, but letting only a select few students get called on for peso questions everyday is unfair and biased. Worst teacher so far
loves to kick out like 7 of us and yell, can't play sorts and play bad grades o yeh CLASS AVERAGE A F cause she carsabout us playin even if everyoneparticipate
He hates technology. And he plays favorites. The better he likes you the higher grade you'll get, if he doesn't like you then well good luck.
She has favorites, yells at people for no good reason and can't conduct. The songs she picks out for class are terrible, we do the same exact thing every day.

Mrs. Sandoval runs the theater department based on favoritism. If you are not one of her favorites don't expect to get roles. Favorites are determined by being friends with prior favorites. This has led to a system of cliques and cattiness in the theater.People who get roles think they are superior to everyone and their talent is overpraised. If you are in a higher level theater class and don't get a part you won't learn anything. She is emotionally manipulative. Do Communit theater instead
mr sutherland thinks hes the best teacher but all he does is tell stories about himself. he only pretends to take an interest in the kids and leaves out certian students. dont play favorites.
he is a good teacher but he is very sarcastic. he will put you down if he doesnt like what you did. in theatre he complains a lot.he favored his students, those who are in theatre and help out.

If you like to sing and perform do not take her class. The performances are lame that Elementary Schools have better performances. She gives you a music history paper to write because she needs to fill up time because there is no performances to work towards. She is confusing and not a very nice person. If you like to sing, then just do it on your own and join a church choir.
Ms. Najar is a terrible teacher! She is mean, and nasty, and horrible! She chooses favorites and they are mostly made up of the quiet ones!
Heath is good only if she likes you and you are one of her top kids. If not you are left alone, and she is mean. plays favorites.
She is rude and has an attitude and did i metion she has favorites and is friend with Mrs. Weikel so now you might understand
The IB kids seem to like him but he talks down to and degrades the orchestra kids. He is also very unfair and makes bad song choices. He also has little to no respect for his two lower orchestras and

everyone sophomore will love vento for her wittiness and strong personality.Definitely whips you into shape when writing an essay and is very good at her job. Overall if you have the chance to take her class, go for it, but in my opinion there are downsides. She makes it very obvious that she has favorites, extremely obvious, and it is fact that she gives into highschool drama which is very innapropraite and frankly annoying, definitely not a favorite teacher due to her snootiness as well.

Ew definitely the worst muscal theatre teacher ever.She didnt care what we wanted to do for Broadway Bound, she just picked the worst show in theatre's history.She taught me nothing.I hate that woman!
hate her... so obvious favorites... when she picks on you to answer, before you can answer, she says NO and picks someone else!!1
Didn't try to know the students. Would pick song choices on his own, didn't take input to what we prefer. Fun class, but not necessarily because of him.
He thinks he's all that, but he's not. He likes to blame and pick on certain students b/c his bands do so bad. That's why he loses so many good players.

completely unfair and picks favorites. if you are not one of her favorites, she picks on and insults you. very very mean. if you do one thing wrong, she will scream at you and embarass you on purpose.
very biased towards students... shows a lot of favoritism... can't teach if her life depends on it... BORING LIKE NONE OTHER!
depends on what you think is important, technique or musicality. if its musicality, you are out lof luck in this program. he chooses favorites and is hard to get along with.
She's so weird and she definately plays favorites. yelled at me for no reason once. she needs to get over herself
he definately chooses favorites in all his classes and continuously makes fun of his students especially about their test grades in front of the class.

talks to much, plays favorites to no end and the funniest part is that none of his favorites like him. I don't like him much either simply because he always picks on me and makes it perfectly clear what he thinks of me
Marlys is the WORST educator I've ever come into contact with. She says one thing, does another. Is inconsistent, unfair, and plays favorites BIG TIME.

Ms Mitchell is so unfair. She treats all of her students very unequally. She plays favoritism a lot!! She will most likely pick over Caucasian people over any other race. I've been in so many situations in which she would let students from other classes turn in their work late and then when it comes to me she would just give me a direct no. If you're going to be a teacher at least be fair. Not to mention how unorganized she is.
great conductor, but, but not that great teacher. He is biased toward jazz band and talks way too much. Tho i've had worse teachers, I wouldn't say that he's one of the better ones.
Mostly nice but its kinda fake, you can feel she is fake and she can get kinda bad tempered, definately has favorites :\
tonette is an awesome sub. :)i especially like her music, i.e. "how do i look it doesn't matter!" have you ever heard her play that song??? she rocks.
Never gives different pieces of music. Year after year you will play the same music and listen to his boring lessons.
HATE her! She has favorites, its obvious. I don't really like what she focuses in to much creative writing.
she has no business teaching, she has obvious favorites and has massive mood swings, avoid if possible
I'm in orch. and Mr. Arizzi is a band teacher teaching orch. It makes for a bad experience please bring back Mr. Schnabel.
definitely one of the worst teachers i've ever had. she played favorites and was SO biased. sometimes she had no idea what she was talking about and contradicted herself.
Mr. Brooks plays favorites, and does not let the students do anything but watch. I like Mr. Earle, he lets everybody participate.
If you don't think the way SHE thinks, she will fail you. She also has obvious favorites and obvious people that she hates. She is not good teacher material.
Econ was a joke. I could have learn more from a sub than this man. He loves his football players and cheerleaders but everyone else is left out.
ya she dose have a computer obsession. she gives us music that on a kupple days before were gonna play it at a CONCERT!! mood swings defintly.

He is quite possibly one of the worst teachers I have ever had. English used to be my favorite subject, but now that I have him as a teacher i dread it. He thinks he explains stuff clearly but never does, and he has favorites. It's quite obvious if you aren't a favorite, bc your grades will be absolute crap. Don't even try to disagree with him or your grade will go down the drain. Your writing will become his because otherwise you don't get a good grade. I do not reccomend him at all
pfff if your serious about band you'll go to pomona. band at Standley is less than average. mr reed, you are too uptight.
Not that great of a teacher. She plays favorites. She's so oblivious to everything that goes on. And changes grading scales when her favorites don't do too well.
Not that great of a teacher. She plays favorites. She's so oblivious to everything that goes on. And changes grading scales when her favorites don't do too well.
Bad teacher. She expected us to learn about 2 sections a day and barely went over problems with us. And she totally plays favorites.
He doesn't help you if your not smart. He only cares about his pet students and gives them candy for the test. HOW LAME!
Mr. G teaches very little music to the lower band. It's an easy 'A' -- basically show up with your music and fog a mirror. But we don't learn anything.
She picks on the good athletes.And doesn't let them have any fun also she has very little knowledge on certain sports
Bad grading system if you're weak in history. He favors the smart kids and doesn't help the weak ones. Bad news here.
i used to love singing but she made me hate it. she always picks the same people and gets made when you ask ?'s. if ur in her class ur doomed.
Mr greenleaf is awful. he is incredibly close minded and if you disagree with him he wont talk to you and you fail.he makes fun of people and he plays favorites
I wish O'neal wouldn't treat his players and family with special treatment. The football players are usually the worst students in the school but they NEVER get in trouble. they usually drop out!
i agree this guy is not one of my favorite teachers and a bear could teach me better but i like the class b/c i play calculator games the whole class
she is horrible-she so plays favorites. her tests are ridiculous. get on her good side or watch out. she will be a witch to you all year and have unmeatable demands.
BAD! wait until you get weeks, then you'll hear how a real orchestra should sound. Tynebor picks too easy music and doesn't work on problems. Chamber in my last year there sucked because of her.
I absolutely hated her. She played favorites really badly, and was even more disorganized than we were. She never kept promises either.
Ive never had such a bad teacher in my life! and youre always yelling at us for how bad were singing then you make up escuse about why you vant sing that part because you cant sing
asiannnnnnnnnnnn!!!!!!!!!!!!! ussually these ppl are smart with technology but this guy ruined it for everybody imean honestly asians did invent like gunpowder
She is mean and enjoys making me feel stupid. She made my favorite subject my least favorite subject/!!!
best and "1st sergent" finnie should be fired. they are bad educators and do nothing but harrass students especialy the quiet ones
She can not teach and she has attitude with her student, my least favorite teacher
Clearly a knowledgeable and enthusiastic history teacher, but blatant misandry is not classroom appropriate. Plays favorites, attacks certain students for minor mistakes.
i hope you will stop the favortism before it causes alot of turmoil. you need to change and im pretty sure everyone else would agree also.
worst teacher ever and gave me a c and showed me my grades and they were 90,91,87,92 she should quit now
ick! worst class i ever had...hes weird...i mean what teacher plays (and sings) their banjo in class?!

MR BEBERT WAS THE WORST TEACHER I HAVE EVER HAD BESIDES HIS WIFE, MRS BEBERT. I CANNOT STAND THEM AND QUIT BAND BECAUSE THEY WERE SUPER BAD TEACHERS! IF I HAD A BETTER TEACHER I WOULD STILL BE DOING BAND. BUT THEY TELL YOU ALL THAT MATTERS IS BAND AND THEY EVEN MAKE KIDS CRY! THEY ARE SUPER STRICT, BORING, MEAN AND AWFUL. PERSONALLY I BELIEVE CUTHBERTSON SHOULD GET NEW BAND TEACHERS! BAND IS SUPPOSED TO BE FUN! THE BEBERTS RUINED BAND FOR ME. DON'T DO BAND AT CUTHBERTSON!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
She was a very unhelpful, mean, uncaring teacher. She played favorites, and the students not in her favor were treated like dirt.
horrible teacher!!!! Assigns busy work constantly. Plays favorites like no ones business. Just awful in general.
She has way too many favorites and doesn't know any of the people's names. She makes totally ranom edits that are opinion, not fact.
NEVER interacted with students, boring. Says 'through' waaay too much. Hated on the smart kids that outdid the ones who donated $$$ to the school. Has favorites, doesn't care for the others.
I had an open mind at the beginning of the year, but he barely reads music, can't keep a steady beat, can't play piano or guitar and has no respect for us!
Horrible teacher. She takes forever to grade assignments and you won't learn anything. She is mean and unfair to random students. Her grading system isn't fair at all. Stay away from her.
I always got really good grades in her Spanish classes (95 and above) but she never even acknowledged me and let students who weren't as good as me be on the Spanish honor society, she favors people
Perhaps it's the whole idea of grading the fine arts that doesn't sit well with me, but Stecker comes off as phony and arbitrary, a combination most students end up disliking.

One of those people who always has to be right. Ive never seen anyone teacher pick favorites as much as her. If you ever try to contradict her or get in any kind of debate you will not get a good grade in her class.

Well..... All he does is talk... Hes harsh on us sometimes and sometimes unfair... He needs to teach us about P.E not about `blah blah blah' like he usually does. But i <3 him! Dont hate-appreciate!!!
i was in band for 2 years. He is a good player, but because you can play doesn't mean you can teach, very mean, couldn't teach and he's one fo those people who is always right, even if you have proof
obviously the kids sticking up for him were his "jock friends". This guy needs to concentrate on his teaching rather than sports.

SWITCH OUT NOW!!!!! she yelled at me for using the bathroom and is biased towards spanish immersion kids. she doesn't know how to be helpful and grades solely off of favorites aka SPANISH IMMERSION KIDS
easily shows who he dislikes in class, plays with grades to make people happy, says inapropriate things, when others come to "grade" him on his teaching he changes the way that he teaches.
Ms. Williams 1/2 your students can't pass your tests!!! Shouldn't that tell you something!!! It's quite obvious!

Ms. moser is the worst teacher I have ever had. She literally will hand out CBRs for any reason, Forgetting pencil, slouching, and crouching behind stand. She even went as far to tell us she was getting "bullied" by STUDENTS because the students were playing Careless Whisper, a song she hates. Also she skips the announcements all the time and she easily plays favorites. She is the reason why I will not be doing marching band in lynbrook and I would like to enjoy my last year at miller. :(

Mrs.Sanchez wasn't all that nice. One reason I thought that is because she treated us like we we were in 2nd grade when we were very mature and she was one of those teachers who picks favorites (girls
Hard to understand what she is saying. Had to learn from the book. Being friends with her will give you a "better" grade. Dislike tardiness, and class clowns.

Each year she picks her smartest student to pick on, and she is relentless. She also is clueless. For example, she told me William B. Yeats was Australian, and that MELANCHOLIC is not a word. She often complains about her problems, and favors the girls on the basketball team. Without a doubt the most uneducated and immoral teacher that I have ever had. She is not qualified to be an English teacher.
The vendetta which he has started stems from me choosing science over history. Rather than understand, he chooses to degrate me, talking behind my back. Thanks.

Picks favorites and is not objective about a student if he doesn't like them. can be discouraging if he doesn't like you which sucks for middle school. He's great to geeks and underdogs and has no sympathy for kids who are seeking to be popular or confused about values even if they are talented in digital design. Very disappointing and can influence choices badly.

I mean, he knows a lot about music, but in everything else, he's pretty much a sitting rock. He gets really upset about the tiniest mistakes, plays favorites A LOT with the actually skilled kids in the class, and pretty much hates everyone else. The only reason he still has his job is because, A. Nobody else is there to take it, and B. He's smart-ish in the one department he does teach.Still, though, one of the worst teachers I've ever had.

She picks favorites like its her job. She gets involved in students personal lives in attempts to stop drama but then makes it worse by only protecting her "favorites". In general She is a bad person.
least considerate teacher ever. He picks on the same kids consistently and does not understand that his class is mandatory. He expects that everyone wants to be in his class as opposed to forced into
Sure her class is easy....if you do history fair and get a good grade on first essay. Plays favorites, seems to not know what she talks about, DOESN'T TEACH!!!!
Subjective grading, lack of clarity on expectations. Just an awful teacher that you have to suffer through before you get to the good ones.

easy to fool if ur female u can say anything hard to understand her speech will give in to anthing so complain abt teachers if u don like grade make stuff up she beleives it not so gud w boys but girlz own her
